description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age provided by author in data file
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -chimpanzee/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
whether the food was presented on paper support or on painted stripes.
"order in which study-specific conditions were presented"
location of the continuous strip (from the participant's perspective) - left / right
selection of the left or right paper strip or painted stripe (from the participant's perspective).
whether or not the participant's choice brought the food - correct / incorrect
